reviewtext: Bought these to enjoy MY music without disturbing the rest of the householdwith B.B. or Luciano or Waylon & Willie.  BASS  =  D.E.E.P  all else = CleaR.I was so impressed ( 1st day ) that I asked my 2 sons to let me know what theythought vs. their earbuds and/or phones.  That was about 1-1/2 weeks ago.and I haveN'T seen them since. (the phones, that is; I always see sons at mealtimes)I should have bought (3) THREE sets 'in self-defense'.Whichever son I find that currently has them, tells me that they will be on my deskwhen they are finished. Seems I just barely miss 'my turn'. (always)My old buds are still OK! ....  BUT .... Will buy MORE ... SOON!
summary: GREAT  ...(so I've heard!) ... as best I can remember
